short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NCT wallpaper turn new tab to HD NCT background. Custom NCT wallpaper background themes for K-pop fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features of the Extension:

1. Have NCT backgrounds automatically rotate when you start a new tab.
2. Using the wallpaper selection panel, pick a favorite wallpaper or select a random NCT background.
3. Google search bar included into the design.
4. Direct connections to your social media accounts and emails for easy access.
5. The time and date are automatically shown.
6. A new function to take notes on your task is Note.
7. Fast links to the websites you visit most often.
8. Easy access to the pages you've bookmarked.
9. The addition of a shortcut panel for easier access to websites.
10. Direct access to Google apps.
11. Direct access to Additional Themes.
12. Quick access to social media sharing.
13. Quick access to download wallpapers.
14. Access to games with just one click.
15. On your NCT new tab, turn on entertaining animations like fireworks, rain, snow, and falling leaves.
